name.ja: <ruby>幻<rt>げん</rt></ruby><ruby>刃<rt>ば</rt></ruby><ruby>攻<rt>こう</rt></ruby><ruby>廠<rt>しょう</rt></ruby>ウォームヤード

effect.en: While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, face-up "Constructor Wyrm Buildragon" and Level 10 Wyrm Type monsters on the field gain 600 ATK, and if they attack a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).
